name: CreateService
description: Create a new Service for the given Account

AutoRedaction.description: Instructs the Speech Recognition service to automatically redact PII from all transcripts made on this service.

AutoTranscribe.description: Instructs the Speech Recognition service to automatically transcribe all recordings made on the account.

DataLogging.description:
Data logging allows Twilio to improve the quality of the speech recognition & language understanding services through using customer data to refine, fine tune and evaluate machine learning models.
Note: Data logging cannot be activated via API, only via www.twilio.com, as it requires additional consent.

FriendlyName.description: A human readable description of this resource, up to 64 characters.

LanguageCode.description: The default language code of the audio.

MediaRedaction.description: Instructs the Speech Recognition service to automatically redact PII from all transcripts media made on this service. The auto_redaction flag must be enabled, results in error otherwise.

UniqueName.description: Provides a unique and addressable name to be assigned to this Service, assigned by the developer, to be optionally used in addition to SID.

WebhookUrl.description: The URL Twilio will request when executing the Webhook.

$ul: **account_sid**: The unique SID identifier of the Account the Service belongs to.
**auto_redaction**: Instructs the Speech Recognition service to automatically redact PII from all transcripts made on this service.
**auto_transcribe**: Instructs the Speech Recognition service to automatically transcribe all recordings made on the account.

**data_logging**: Data logging allows Twilio to improve the quality of the speech recognition & language understanding services through using customer data to refine, fine tune and evaluate machine learning models.
**date_created**: The date that this Service was created, given in ISO 8601 format.
**date_updated**: The date that this Service was updated, given in ISO 8601 format.
**friendly_name**: A human readable description of this resource, up to 64 characters.
**language_code**: The default language code of the audio.

**media_redaction**: Instructs the Speech Recognition service to automatically redact PII from all transcripts media made on this service. The auto_redaction flag must be enabled, results in error otherwise.
**sid**: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Service.
**unique_name**: Provides a unique and addressable name to be assigned to this Service, assigned by the developer, to be optionally used in addition to SID.
**version**: The version number of this Service.
**webhook_url**: The URL Twilio will request when executing the Webhook.
